update.description:
Language updates.
Add CA certificates bundle. Upgrade linux kernel to 3.4-2 (3.4.87).
Upgrade apache to 2.2.27, conntrack-tools to 1.4.2, dhcpcd to 6.3.2, dnsmasq to 2.70, iproute2 to 3.14.0, e1000e network driver to 3.0.4.1, igb network driver to 5.2.5, openswan to 2.6.41, openvpn to 2.3.3, ppp to 2.4.6, pptp to 1.8.0, rrdtool to 1.4.8, sqlite to 3.8.4.3, squid to 3.4.4, usb-modeswitch to 2.1.1, usb-modeswitch-data to 20140327.
Upgrade Perl modules DBD-SQLite to 1.42, DBI to 1.631, IO-Socket-SSL to 1.981, NetAddr-IP to 4.073.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
